name: Sonlight Christian Preschool
description: Sonlight Christian Preschool is a faith-based early childhood education center operated by Grace Fellowship Church in London, Kentucky. The preschool serves children aged 6 weeks to 5 years old and school-age children up to 12 years old. The program uses a Christian preschool curriculum that integrates faith-based learning with early childhood development. Sonlight provides a nurturing and caring environment where children receive both educational and spiritual development. The preschool operates as a ministry of Grace Fellowship Church, offering quality childcare and early education services to families in the London community.
source: Verified from official Sonlight Preschool website and multiple online directories
eligibility: Children aged 6 weeks to 12 years old. Open to families seeking Christian-based early childhood education.
notes: A ministry of Grace Fellowship Church. The preschool uses a Christian curriculum that integrates faith-based learning with early childhood development. Contact for enrollment information and to schedule a tour. Online application available on website.
